metadata.title: CVE-2017-14165 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The ReadSUNImage function in coders/sun.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has anissue where memory allocation is excessive because it depends only on alength field in a header. This may lead to remote denial of service in theMagickMalloc function in magick/memory.c.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
